title: Impact of interest rate policy on capital inflows

content.prompt: If the Federal Reserve undertakes a policy to reduce interest rates, international capital flows will be affected in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Long-run capital outflows from the United States will decrease.
Long-run capital inflows to the United States will increase.
Short-run capital outflows from the United States will decrease.
Short-run capital inflows to the United States will decrease.
Short-run capital inflows to the United States will not change.
